value.title: Inside 'TALON,' the Nationwide Network of AI-Enabled Surveillance Cameras
value.excerpt: Hundreds of pages of emails obtained by Motherboard show how little-known company Flock has expanded from surveilling individual neighborhoods into a network of smart cameras that spans the United States.

value.title: Britain's GCHQ Cyber Spies Embrace the AI Revolution
value.excerpt: Britain's cyber spies at the GCHQ eavesdropping agency say they have fully embraced artificial intelligence (AI) to uncover patterns in vast amounts of global data to counter hostile disinformation and snare child abusers.

value.title: Microsoft CEO harps on data privacy, AI ethics

value.title: AI researchers detail obstacles to data sharing in Africa

value.title: Google fires second AI ethics leader as dispute over research, diversity grows
value.excerpt: Alphabet Inc's Google fired staff scientist Margaret Mitchell on Friday, they both said, a move that fanned company divisions on academic freedom and diversity that were on display since its December dismissal of AI ethics researcher Timnit Gebru.
